title: 95/98/EC: Commission Decision of 13 March 1995 establishing the status of Sweden as non-vaccinating as regards Newcastle disease
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 13 March 1995 establishing the status of Sweden as non-vaccinating as regards Newcastle disease  (Text with EEA relevance) (95/98/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Sweden fulfils the criteria fixed by Article 12 (2) of Directive  90/539/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 March 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
